duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Product Owner in writing user stories and editing acceptance criteria in alignment with feature objectives.
Proactively bring ideas to increase customer value, recognize roadblocks early, and present ideas and options to key partners.
Troubleshoot product questions and technical challenges and facilitate meetings to innovate and problem solve.
Create and test product features, demo solution options, and understand and utilize Modern Delivery practices.
Participate in all agile ceremonies, use applications including Jira, Teams, Salesforce configuration workbook, Confluence, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and Visio.
Understand and quickly learn Client's Salesforce technology and value, as well as business use cases and needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or equivalent work experience
